languages.text:
"Всякому с радостью может поведать об этом,
Гордый воитель, болтливый Хальбрандт Пустомеля,
Слухов певец и побасенок дивный сказитель,
Ибо достойных событий он в жизни не видел".

"Any who cross his path
let him regale, and gladly,
That proud warrior,
Halbrandt Blatherskite;
Singer of rumours
and fine tattler of tall tales,
For he has glimpsed
no worthy deeds
in his short life."
languages.original_text:
"Всякому с радостью может поведать об этом,
Гордый воитель, болтливый Хальбрандт Пустомеля,
Слухов певец и побасенок дивный сказитель,
Ибо достойных событий он в жизни не видел".

languages.text:
“若是有谁与他擦肩而过，
请让他热情地为你唱响，
那个傲慢的战士，
吹牛大王哈尔布兰特的诗歌。
那个满口谎言的歌者，
他的史诗只有以讹传讹。
因为他短暂的一生中，
没有任何值得称道的传说。”
languages.original_text:
"Any who cross his path
let him regale, and gladly,
That proud warrior,
Halbrandt Blatherskite;
Singer of rumours
and fine tattler of tall tales,
For he has glimpsed
no worthy deeds
in his short life."

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
「彼の道を妨げし者
享受せしめよ、喜び勇んで、
誇り高き戦士、
戯れ言のハルブラント、
流言の歌い手にして
大言壮語の優れた使い手、
それも何一つ成していないゆえ
価値ある偉業を
その短き人生で」
languages.original_text:
"Any who cross his path
let him regale, and gladly,
That proud warrior,
Halbrandt Blatherskite;
Singer of rumours
and fine tattler of tall tales,
For he has glimpsed
no worthy deeds
in his short life."

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
«Bienaventurado quien encuentre
y agasaje de buena gana
a aquel aguerrido adalid,
llamado Halbrandt el Charlatán.
Su oficio es juglar rumores
y divulgar patrañas,
pues proeza verdadera
no ha presenciado
en su corta existencia».
languages.original_text:
"Any who cross his path
let him regale, and gladly,
That proud warrior,
Halbrandt Blatherskite;
Singer of rumours
and fine tattler of tall tales,
For he has glimpsed
no worthy deeds
in his short life."

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
« Si vous croisez le chemin
d'Halbrandt l'Enjôleur,
ce fier guerrier
colporteur de rumeurs,
il vous régalera de ses histoires
inventées de toutes pièces,
car nul geste noble
n'a jamais illuminé
sa triste et courte vie. »
languages.original_text:
"Any who cross his path
let him regale, and gladly,
That proud warrior,
Halbrandt Blatherskite;
Singer of rumours
and fine tattler of tall tales,
For he has glimpsed
no worthy deeds
in his short life."

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
"Wer seinen Pfad kreuzt,
lasst ihn sich ergötzen,
denn dieser stolze Krieger
Halbrandt Quatschkopf,
Sänger von Gerüchten
und Erzähler von Lügengeschichten,
hat noch nie erblickt
auch nur eine große Tat
in seinem kurzen Leben."
languages.original_text:
"Any who cross his path
let him regale, and gladly,
That proud warrior,
Halbrandt Blatherskite;
Singer of rumours
and fine tattler of tall tales,
For he has glimpsed
no worthy deeds
in his short life."

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
"Onunla yolu kesişenler,
Bırakın neşeyle eğlensin.
Bekler geveze Halbrandt,
Söylentilerin sesiyle.
Gururlu bir savaşçı,
İyi bir masalcı o.
Zira şu kısa hayatında
Becerdiği ne var?
Hiçbir şey olamadı gitti."
languages.original_text:
"Any who cross his path
let him regale, and gladly,
That proud warrior,
Halbrandt Blatherskite;
Singer of rumours
and fine tattler of tall tales,
For he has glimpsed
no worthy deeds
in his short life."

traits.locale_text:
"Onun yoluna çıkanlar,
Bırakın eğlensin neşeyle.
O gururlu savaşçı
Geveze Halbrandt,
söylentilerin sesi
ve hikâyelerin uydurmacısıdır.
Zira kısa hayatında
hiç değerli bir iş
becerdiği olmamıştır."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
